name: Eroded Scale-Feather
description: A pitch-black scale that fell to the ground after the battle against the Lordof Eroded Primal Fire.  The ancient dragons once used their fallen scales as a means to transmitsecret messages and edicts.  This scale has been utterly corroded by the power of darkness, the light thatwas once engraved upon it wholly devoured, leaving naught but twisted, darkremnants.
